question: On dividing a number by 357, we get 39 as remainder. On dividing the same number 17, what will be the remainder ?
answer_description: Letxbe the number andybe the quotient. Then,x= 357 xy+ 39= (17 x 21 xy) + (17 x 2) + 5= 17 x (21y+ 2) + 5)Required remainder = 5.

question: If the product 4864 x 9 P 2 is divisible by 12, then the value of P is:
answer_description: Clearly, 4864 is divisible by 4.So, 9P2 must be divisible by 3. So, (9 + P + 2) must be divisible by 3.P = 1.

question: Which one of the following is the common factor of (4743+ 4343) and (4747+ 4347) ?
answer_description: Whennis odd, (xn+an) is always divisible by (x+a).Each one of (4743+ 4343) and (4747+ 4347) is divisible by (47 + 43).

question: A number when divided by 296 leaves 75 as remainder. When the same number is divided by 37, the remainder will be:
answer_description: Letx= 296q+ 75= (37 x 8q+ 37 x 2) + 1= 37 (8q+ 2) + 1Thus, when the number is divided by 37, the remainder is 1.
